/circle5Ladies with a Bmi (Body Mass Index greater than 30 will require the higher 5mgs dose, which can only be obtained by prescription from GP) 
/circle5Include foods rich in folic acid in your diet- green veg, brown rice, breakfast cereals 
Vitamin D
/circle510 mcg supplements should be taken throughout pregnancy and whilst breastfeeding 
/circle5Helps to absorb Calcium 
/circle5Can be bought over the counter. 
Vitamin A 
/circle5Avoid large volumes of Vitamin A or Vitamin A supplements in
